publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1320.2 Fiona Hyslop: Equality Strategy-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1320) in the name of Jackie Baillie, leave out from "welcomes" to end and insert "notes the publication of the Scottish Executive's strategy set out in Working together for Equality, regrets that currently the legislative competence for equal opportunities remains with the Westminster Parliament, and therefore calls on the Scottish Executive within its limited powers to implement all the exceptions listed under section L2 of Schedule 5 to the Scotland Act 1998 in meeting their objectives to attain equality of opportunity for all."
